remarks: The set in the supremum of the operator norm definition ~ df-nmop is a set of reals.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
nmopsetretALT $p |- ( T : ~H --> ~H -> { x | E. y e. ~H ( ( normh ` y ) <_ 1 /\ x = ( normh ` ( T ` y ) ) ) } C_ RR ) $.
$d T x y $.
